name: Metal Gear 20th Anniversary: Metal Gear Solid Collection
synopsis: {{Collection|Japanese editions of Metal Gear, Metal Gear 2: Solid Snake, Metal Gear Solid (PS), [[Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty]], [[Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater]], Metal Gear Solid Portable Ops (PSP), Metal Gear Saga (DVD) and [[The Document of Metal Gear Solid 2]].}} Metal Gear and Metal Gear 2: Solid Snake are ported MSX games with some enhancements contain on one PS2 DVD exclusive to this collection. Test information for this DVD should be collected on this page.
